question: Which of the following battles was fought during the reign of Lord Dalhousie?
explanation: Second Anglo Sikh war was fought in the year 1848-49 during the reign of Lord Dalhousie. It ended with the annexation of Punjab by the British in the year 1849 (March). Another important battle that was fought during the tenure of Lord Dalhousie is the second Burmese war in the year 1852.
